name: Pošta Slovenije d.o.o.
goal:
Provision of the following services:
- universal postal services and other lettermail services of commercial nature;
- parcel services and express mail services;
- logistics services;
- IT services;
- financial services.
interests: Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
Single digital market
Postal Services Directive
Regulation on Cross-border Parcel Delivery Services
The General Data Protection Regulation
